name: Ultimate War
description: This game is an FPS mode, where we will start with a single game mode and we will add many more updates with fun modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 o 10 Processor: Core i5 2.8 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 o AMD Radeon HD 7870 con GPU DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
